document_data.name: Blasingdell
document_data.title: Hooks: The Forge of Fury
document_data.author: [[Alan Patrick]]
document_data.work: Tales From the Yawning Portal Adventure Hooks
document_data.Geography: Blasingdell was situated thirty miles south of the mountain known as the [[Stone Tooth]], a peak of the southern [[Spine of the World]] range.{{Cite adventurers league/A Thousand Tiny Deaths|2,23}}
document_data.Defenses: Blasingdell had a town watch of four men-at-arms. Their leader was a [[half-orc]] named Sergeant [[Grendar Kuln]]; he was assisted by Constable [[Dara Whitewood]]; under them were two full-time guardsmen. In times of strife, these four would supplement their numbers with a militia of up to a hundred local men and women.

Notable Locations.Shops & Businesses: Tolm's Superior Outfitting and Dry Goods run by a male [[dwarf]] named [[Kheldegan Tolm]].
Notable Locations.Inns/Taverns: Griffon's Nest Inn and Tavern run by a female [[half-elf]] named [[Sarel Bankdown]].
Notable Locations.Temples: A small town temple that a human priest named [[Sister Alonsa]] looks after, assisted by two acolytes.
